content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Levels up an usually easy conditional problem

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Quite a tricky puzzle, but very well set. Test cases cover a good range of edge cases and is very instructive,

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Clear instruction, Nice for practice basic
I hope you received enough feedback from the community to improve your contribution. Once you have made the necessary updates, publish your contribution!

Goal
* I initially misinterpreted the statement to mean that we should keep increasing scores until the fail rate was acceptable, but stop once any score reached 100. Would it be possible to rephrase the part "(scores capped at 100)" to help avoid this potential misunderstanding?

* Please add an apostrophe in "every students [[score]]".

Constraints
* The maximum value for [[n]] is 20 among the current cases. Please lower the value 200 (mentioned in the constraint) to 100 or 50.

* Please add constraints for the ranges of [[max_fail_rate]] and [[scores]].

Cases
* Validators 2 and 6 contain scores of 100 in the input, but such a scenario isn't present in any visible tests. Please modify two or more tests to include scores of 100.

* Tests 2 and 7 contain scores of 0 in the input, but such a scenario isn't present in any validators. Please modify two or more validators to include scores of 0.

Thanks.
Thanks as always. That rewording was a good catch, I can see how confusing it was now. I've implemented all your suggestions and added 2 new test-validators pairs too.

Suggest to add another pair of cases where max_fail_rate = 100 and all the different grades are present in the output. In particular, include the scores 49, 74, 84 and 85 in the validator.

Thanks.

Good idea. I've added that now.

Note to self:
This is the code I used to generate those tests
https://ato.pxeger.com/run?1=XZFNTsMwEIXFNqeYetVS17hS0gREYUGFWLKvqsokDomUuFWciJ-2J2HTBZyDe3Aaxk4cFaRIyXvzeebF8_FZNU9vx-NXU6eT6OfsuxSv61TkxboStYQ5TDn3VPd2NY1awTn8ZS8so-NNJQ2wREU5jXwa-jQKaBjQGT4-DTj1L1cOHM9hqCatYDp_lyNW5yV-l2K7g0qoZMgZw14jOHgOy5o0LeTA2za1_peCKgotRgnxXrK8kJ1m8aZR9W5v1b414RoCDge46btoDxyPCQY9vmz5MUyp-c8VK3OFiaRKXCop4gySDXQnsM9zJRJzhyejboHc4xQCV707C4z7KLRGF09BXwlt5e4Ujqy1MBZ5WBDE7R3YSSZMu8dunW6tvw
